name: Dinner Tonight: Roasted Shallot and Dijon Vinaigrette
description: This full flavored vinaigrette came from the Cafe Flora Cookbook, a vegetarian restaurant in Seattle that I’ve never been to. Oh well, I’ve had a lot of luck these kind of works, because they tend to pack a lot of...

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the shallot in half, remove the outer skin. Crush and peel the garlic.
Toss the shallot and garlic with 1 tablespoon of the olive oil and then wrap loosely in aluminum foil. Cook for 20 minutes. Unwrap the foil and cook for another 10 minutes, or until nicely browned.
Toss everything except the oil into the blender. Process on low, slowly adding the olive oil until smooth.
